p: For medium scale production, the hIgG 1Fc-VHH chimeric antibodies were expressed in a CHO transient expression system as previously described ( Daramola et al., 2014). The sequences for the hIgG 1Fc-VHH chimeric antibodies were synthesized by GeneArt, ThermoFisher and cloned into OriP-containing expression vectors ( Gahn and Sugden, 1995). Twenty litre cell culture volumes in disposable rocking bioreactors were subsequently transiently transfected with the expression vectors. The clarified harvest supernatant was purified using Protein A-based chromatography ( Liu et al., 2010).
